segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and he looks so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, but he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both having fun, even if it’s a little dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, which is making this even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how sneaky they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it before the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so carefully, and it’s almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, and it’s cute how excited she looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is one of those moments they’ll laugh about later.
segments.speaker: PAR
